bio: I am a full time software engineer with a strong passion in solving challenging problems and producing high quality codes and designing in general. With the specializations in Solution Development, Data Structure Algorithm, and User Interface Design (UI/UX) at Singapore Polytechnic, Singapore, I foresee myself to contribute to the coding world and make a difference. Currently, I am in love with this functional programming language, Elixir and leading the Elixir team in Pixium Digital, Singapore.

list: Champion of Clementi Community Centre 2018, Singapore.
Champion of Radiance Beatbox Jam 2019, Singapore.
Champion of A Cappella Beatbox Championship 2019, Singapore.
Champion of Cypher Beatbox Battle 2019, Singapore.

Champion of A Cappella Beatbox Battle 2019, Singapore.
